subject: Re: An international QS version of "Through The Looking-Glass"
msgSnippet: Thanks for this! Question:  why did you leave the poetry in Latin letters, instead of also converting them to QS as well? I find that for myself reading poetry
messageBody:
Thanks for this!

Question: why did you leave the poetry in Latin letters, instead of also converting them to QS as well?

I find that for myself reading poetry is the best way to learn a writing system.
